data.eml:eml: The larvae of the European species of genus Apataniana Mosely, 1936 (Trichoptera, Apataniidae): descriptions, key and ecology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Waringer, Johann, Malicky, Hans (2016): The larvae of the European species of genus Apataniana Mosely, 1936 (Trichoptera, Apataniidae): descriptions, key and ecology. ZooKeys 586: 121-134, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.586.7758, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.586.7758
